parentheses 5 markers including 1 for bor as directed scrap yarn tapestry needle to weave in ends 3 pattern instructions this garment is worked top-down mostly in the round the neckhole is cast on and initially worked flat then joined in the round a compound modified raglan construction is used to shape the yoke once armscye depth is reached body and sleeve stitches are separated and each worked in the round both are finished with 2x2 ribbing stitches around the neckhole are picked up and worked in 2x2 ribbing in the round to form the neckband raglan shaping 1 with 5 mm / us size 8 circular
